audioText: Elle travaille tant que sa santé commence à en souffrir.
question: What does the speaker say about her work situation?
options: She works so much that her health is starting to suffer from it
She works only when her health allows it
She stopped working because of health problems
She works very little to protect her health
explanation: The construction 'tant que' here means 'so much that' (expressing consequence). She works so much that it's starting to affect her health negatively. 'Tant' emphasizes the excessive amount of work.
